fraction
Class RatioOperator

java.lang.Object
  fraction.RatioOperator

public class RatioOperator
extends java.lang.Object

Class includes several method to do mathwork on fractions.

Author:
Tobias Preuﬂ (s0516424) & Niels Richter (s0517512)

multiply

public void multiply(int num1,
                     int den1,
                     int num2,
                     int den2)
Multiplies the given numerator1 and numerator2, the same with denomerator. The products are individually stored into the fields: resultNumerators, resultDenomerators.
